entry.title: WIND WARNING, Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:40 a.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 14. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 60 gusting to 90 this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
